full_title: Will You Finish Your Novel Today?
author: coder
full_description: It's the weekend and you have a novel you've been meaning to finish. Will today be the day?

scores.name: Time
scores.ending_message: LOSE: You ran out of time for your novel. Hopefully you at least had a nice day otherwise.

scores.name: Pages
scores.ending_message: WIN: Congratulations! You finished your novel today!

outcomes.message: You hit a tropey bit you really enjoyed and felt the pages fly by!
You became really bored with this section and couldn't muster up the energy to continue.
You sat down and were disciplined and got through a decent number of pages, even if you had to force yourself the whole time.
The cat hid herself somewhere and you were able to focus solely on your book and got some serious reading done.
The cat was being adorable and so you were distracted petting and cuddling with her.
The cat wanted to go out onto the balcony so you went out there and read in the hammock.
You remembered your book club and redoubled your efforts to read more.
You suddenly got hungry and went to make yourself a snack.
You read some online comments about the book and then started storming through the pages.
